Fit and Models¶

Genealogy¶

Curve¶

class mfm.curve.Curve(x=None, y=None, copy_array=True, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
property cdf¶

Cumulative sum of function

Return type

Type[Curve]

property dx¶

The derivative of the x-axis

Return type

<built-in function array>

normalize(self, mode: 'str' = 'max', curve: 'mfm.curve.Curve' = None, inplace: 'bool' = True) → 'float'[source]¶

Calculates a scaling parameter for the Curve object and (optionally) scales the Curve object.

Parameters

  • mode (str) – either ‘max’ to normalize the maximum to one, or ‘sum’ to normalize to sum to one

  • curve (Optional[Curve]) –

  • inplace (bool) – if True the Curve object is modified in place. Otherwise, only the scaling parameter

is returned :rtype: float :return: the parameter that scales the Curve object
